extendedInfo.description: It is a raining night in the city in Black and white. and we made this into a 3D cube live wallpaper. And we added lighting effects and particle effects to give it a stunning visual effect. Features Include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper buying pro is a definate if it doesn\'t glitch this week
reviews.author: A Google User
